bug.author: JoanFM
bug.summary: Not able to interpet top_k introduced by jinabox (And I guess also not by python client)
bug.description: Describe the bug Currently jina is not able to pass and interpret the top_k parameter sent by jinabox. PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jina-ai/jina/pull/941>#941</denchmark-link> fixes the issue â”†Issue is synchronized with this <denchmark-link:https://jinaai.atlassian.net/browse/JINACORE-229>Jira Task</denchmark-link> by <denchmark-link:https://www.unito.io/learn-more>Unito</denchmark-link>
